data.text: «Za mɔnɔ nà-kpaazaɠa wooi ɠa ziiɠaawanai wuzeɠezu,
Ni nà la zoo gè kwɛɛ, ʋɛ nà GALA ka ná,
Toɠa kpɔɛi ʋɛɛ bà, ga suvikɛi kpein ɓaa?
Toɠa kwɛɛ ga zunu ʋe sɔlegai é woozuɠulasu tɔun bɛ,
Kɛlɛ nà liina folo ɠulazu ʋelei, é la miná.
Ni nà gaiziɛna lɛkpɛmaʋɛ nu ɠɔʋɛzuʋɛ, gè la zooga pɛtɛsu.
Anɛɛ naa ʋe, pelei nii gè ziɛzu la, é naa ɠwɛɛ.
Mazɔlɔɔ gè ziɛni siɛnɔpɛ su ga kɔɠɔ ʋogi.
Gè la ɠɛlɛni ɠolozu ná-deveiti bɛ.
Kɛlɛ tɔun, siɛgi zu a devena la, ɓɛ ɠa a seɠe ma?
Ungo, devei é boga é ʋilɛ nɔ̀un ba, toɠa naa laazeeli,
Naa ɠa é ba, dàavegɛ ga dualuagi tɔun gaazu.
Mazɔlɔɔ kuai laade, é ʋa dɔ̀ maaɠɛkpɔgi zu,
